title: dotdo v2: Semantic Runtime for Durable Objects
description:
Complete rewrite of dotdo as a semantic runtime with:
- Semantic type system (Nouns, Verbs, Things, Actions)
- Cap'n Web RPC for remote introspection/execution
- Cost-optimized durability (Pipeline-as-WAL)
- AI-native operations (template literals, cascade)
- Distributed queries (fanout, sharding, replication)

title: Core Foundation (DOCore)
description:
Minimal DO foundation (~5KB):
- State management
- Alarm scheduling
- Basic fetch routing
- Hibernate/wake lifecycle

title: [RED] Core Foundation tests
description:
Write failing tests for DOCore:
- State management (get/set/delete)
- Alarm scheduling (setAlarm, deleteAlarm)
- Fetch routing (method, path matching)
- Hibernate/wake lifecycle hooks

title: [GREEN] Core Foundation implementation
description:
Implement DOCore to pass tests:
- StateManager class
- AlarmScheduler class
- FetchRouter class
- Lifecycle hooks

title: [REFACTOR] Core Foundation cleanup
description:
Refactor DOCore:
- Extract interfaces
- Optimize memory footprint
- Add JSDoc documentation
- Ensure < 5KB bundle size

title: Human-in-the-Loop
description:
Human orchestration:
- Approval workflows
- Escalation policies
- SLA tracking
- Review queues
- Multi-channel notifications

title: [RED] Human-in-the-Loop tests
description:
Write failing tests for HITL:
- ApprovalWorkflow creation
- EscalationPolicy triggers
- SLA tracking and alerts
- ReviewQueue management
- Multi-channel notifications

title: [GREEN] Human-in-the-Loop implementation
description:

title: [REFACTOR] Human-in-the-Loop cleanup
description:
Refactor HITL:
- Pluggable notification channels

title: Semantic Type System (DOSemantic)
description:
Semantic primitives (~20KB):
- Noun definitions with auto-derived forms
- Verb definitions with tenses
- Thing instances
- Actions (unified events + edges + audit)
- Four relationship operators (-> ~> <- <~)

title: [RED] Semantic Type System tests
description:
Write failing tests for DOSemantic:
- Noun: auto-derived singular/plural forms
- Verb: auto-derived tenses (past, present, gerund)
- Thing: instance creation with $id, $type
- Action: unified event/edge/audit creation
- Operators: -> ~> <- <~ traversal

title: [GREEN] Semantic Type System implementation
description:
Implement DOSemantic to pass tests:
- Noun class with pluralize
- Verb class with conjugate
- Thing class with identity
- Action class with unified model
- Operator implementations

title: [REFACTOR] Semantic Type System cleanup
description:
Refactor DOSemantic:
- Extract NounRegistry, VerbRegistry
- Optimize Proxy usage for operators
- Type-safe generics for Thing<T>
- Ensure < 20KB bundle size

title: Storage Stack (DOStorage)
description:
Four-layer durability stack (~40KB):
- L0: InMemory (O(1) reads, dirty tracking, LRU)
- L1: Pipeline (WAL, fire-and-forget)
- L2: SQLite (lazy checkpoint, batched writes)
- L3: Iceberg (cold storage, time travel)
- Cold start recovery

title: [RED] Storage Stack tests
description:
Write failing tests for DOStorage:
- L0 InMemory: CRUD, dirty tracking, LRU eviction
- L1 Pipeline: emit, batch, durability guarantee
- L2 SQLite: lazy checkpoint, batch writes
- L3 Iceberg: cold storage, time travel queries
- Cold start recovery from L2/L3

title: [GREEN] Storage Stack implementation
description:
Implement DOStorage to pass tests:
- InMemoryStateManager
- PipelineEmitter
- LazyCheckpointer
- IcebergWriter
- ColdStartRecovery

title: [REFACTOR] Storage Stack cleanup
description:
Refactor DOStorage:
- Extract IStorageLayer interface
- Composable layer stack
- Configurable checkpoint thresholds
- Ensure < 40KB bundle size

title: Workflow Context ($)
description:
Universal API via $ context (~60KB):
- Event handling ($.on.Noun.verb pattern)
- Scheduling DSL ($.every.Monday.at9am)
- Durable execution ($.do, $.try, $.send)
- Cross-DO RPC ($.Customer(id).notify())
- Cascade execution tiers

title: [RED] Workflow Context tests
description:
Write failing tests for WorkflowContext ($):
- $.on.Noun.verb() event handlers
- $.every.day.at() scheduling DSL
- $.do(), $.try(), $.send() durability
- $.Customer(id).method() cross-DO RPC
- Cascade execution (code→gen→agentic→human)

title: [GREEN] Workflow Context implementation
description:
Implement WorkflowContext to pass tests:
- EventHandlerRegistry with Proxy
- ScheduleBuilder DSL
- DurableExecutor
- CrossDORPCProxy
- CascadeExecutor

title: [REFACTOR] Workflow Context cleanup
description:
Refactor WorkflowContext:
- Split into composable mixins
- Type-safe event/schedule builders
- Configurable cascade thresholds
- Ensure < 60KB bundle size

title: AI Operations
description:
Template literal AI:
- ai\`...\` tagged template
- is\`...\`, list\`...\`, code\`...\` variants
- AIPromise for no-await patterns
- Batch modes (immediate/flex/deferred)
- Budget and caching

title: [RED] AI Operations tests
description:
Write failing tests for AI module:
- ai\`...\` template literal execution
- is\`...\`, list\`...\`, code\`...\` variants

- Budget tracking and caching

- BudgetTracker
- ResponseCache

title: [REFACTOR] AI Operations cleanup
description:

title: Cap'n Web RPC Layer
description:
Capability-based RPC:
- DO interface generation
- $meta introspection (schema, methods, capabilities)
- Promise pipelining
- Capability-based security
- Type-safe remote execution

title: [RED] Cap'n Web RPC tests
description:
Write failing tests for RPC layer:
- Interface generation from DO class
- $meta.schema(), $meta.methods()
- Promise pipelining (chained calls)
- Capability-based access control
- Type-safe remote execution

title: [GREEN] Cap'n Web RPC implementation
description:
Implement RPC layer to pass tests:
- InterfaceGenerator
- MetaIntrospector
- PipelineResolver
- CapabilityChecker
- TypedRPCProxy

title: [REFACTOR] Cap'n Web RPC cleanup
description:
Refactor RPC layer:
- Schema codegen tooling
- Binary serialization option
- Batch RPC calls
- Connection pooling

title: Worker Layer
description:
Deployment patterns:
- URL routing (subdomain, path-ns, path-base)
- RPC proxy to DO
- Sharding via consistent hash
- Replication with intent detection
- Worker presets (single, typed, sharded, replicated)

title: [RED] Worker Layer tests
description:
Write failing tests for Worker layer:
- Subdomain routing (tenant.api.dotdo.dev)
- Path routing (/ns/type/id)
- RPC proxy to DO
- Sharding via consistent hash
- Read replica routing

description:

- Worker presets

title: [REFACTOR] Worker Layer cleanup

- Subrequest budget management
- Result merging and streaming
